snippet.textDisplay:
Yo where's Kirby at?
Seaside Hill Zone?
snippet.textOriginal:
Yo where's Kirby at?
Seaside Hill Zone?

snippet.textDisplay:
Lyrics:
Accordeon: 
If you got still some money in your po-cket, then try and go to Seaside Town!
What you gonna buy?
What you wanna buy?
It's the best in the whole world, that's Seaside Town!

Flute:
Go, go shopping in Seaside!
We got ev'rything there,
for your money you really don't care.
Go, go shopping in Seaside!
We hope, you will enjoy this whole stuff!
(Yay!)

Then it repeats over and over. ^^
snippet.textOriginal:

for your money you really don't care.

The game's entire soundtrack is fantastic, though.

snippet.textDisplay: I replayed this game not too long ago and it was just as awesome. For me there are only a few RPGs that I can replay many times while still feeling fresh. Games like this, Earthbound, Chrono Trigger or Secret of Mana come to mind. There are some great RPGs that I loved but wouldn't feel like replaying.
snippet.textOriginal: I replayed this game not too long ago and it was just as awesome. For me there are only a few RPGs that I can replay many times while still feeling fresh. Games like this, Earthbound, Chrono Trigger or Secret of Mana come to mind. There are some great RPGs that I loved but wouldn't feel like replaying.
